amendment.description: Amendment adds a requirement that a company not be considered an emerging growth company if it has issued more than $1 billion in nonconvertible debt over the prior 3 years.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 112-409 to add a requirement that a company not be considered an "emerging growth company" if it has issued more than $1 billion in non-convertible debt over the prior three years.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A004) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
